creator: cwhit

content: The 'send' button is on the composition toolbar and that may have been reset. Click 'new message' and then click view>toolbars and tick composition toolbar. If you do not see the View option after clicking 'new message', click the alt key to display the menu bar and then click the view option.
creator: davidsk

content: If you post information on whatever problem you are encountering, someone on the forum here may be able to assist in correcting it.
creator: davidsk

content: Do they each have unique Yahoo accounts, or are they aliases from your account? I am unclear on what you mean by "it redirects the Oauth login..."
creator: davidsk

content: Thank you for your desire to help. We sincerely appreciate it and regret you are having a problem in donating. Unfortunately, this is the tech support forum, and we cannot assist there. Please visit this URL for assistance in donating: https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/donate/help/ and thanks again for your support.
creator: davidsk

content: Try this: click the three dots to the right of 'new message' button and select folder mode and 'unified folders' and advise if that addresses your issue. Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate them, as they are often not seen here. :)
creator: davidsk
